flavor_text_entries.sword:
Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself
from its own high-voltage power.
flavor_text_entries.red:
Its long tail
serves as a
ground to protect itself from its
own high voltage
power.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
Its long tail
serves as a
ground to protect itself from its
own high voltage
power.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
When electricity
builds up inside
its body, it becomes feisty.
It also glows in
the dark.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
When its electric­
ity builds, its
muscles are stimu­ lated, and it be­
comes more aggres­
sive than usual.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
If the electric
pouches in its
cheeks become fully charged,
both ears will
stand straight up.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
If its electric
pouches run empty,
it raises its tail to gather electri­
city from the
atmosphere.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
If the electrical sacks become
excessively charged, RAICHU plants its
tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be
found near this POKéMON’s nest.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
This POKéMON exudes a weak electrical
charge from all over its body that makes
it take on a slight glow in darkness. RAICHU searches for electricity by
planting its tail in the ground.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
If it stores too much electricity, its
behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this,
it occasionally discharges excess energy
and calms itself down.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Its electric charges can reach even
100,000 volts. Careless contact can cause
even an Indian elephant to faint.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
Its long tail serves as a ground to
protect itself from its own high-voltage
power.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It turns aggressive if it has too
much electricity in its body. It
discharges power through its tail.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
It can loose 100,000-volt bursts
of electricity, instantly downing
foes several times its size.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Its tail discharges electricity into
the ground, protecting it from
getting shocked.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
When its electricity builds, its
muscles are stimulated, and it becomes
more aggressive than usual.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
If the electric pouches in its
cheeks become fully charged,
both ears will stand straight up.
flavor_text_entries.black:
Its tail discharges electricity into
the ground, protecting it from
getting shocked.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Its tail discharges electricity into
the ground, protecting it from
getting shocked.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Its tail discharges electricity into
the ground, protecting it from
getting shocked.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Its tail discharges electricity into
the ground, protecting it from
getting shocked.
flavor_text_entries.x:
When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated,
and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity,
instantly downing foes several times its size.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
If the electrical sacs become excessively charged,
Raichu plants its tail in the ground and discharges.
Scorched patches of ground will be found near this
Pokémon’s nest.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
This Pokémon exudes a weak electrical charge from all over
its body that makes it take on a slight glow in darkness.
Raichu plants its tail in the ground to discharge electricity.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
It unleashes electric shocks that can reach
100,000 volts. When agitated, it can knock out
even an Indian elephant.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
It becomes aggressive when it has electricity
stored up. At such times, even its Trainer has to
take care to avoid being attacked.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
As electricity builds up inside its body, it
becomes more aggressive. One theory is that
the electricity buildup is actually causing stress.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Because so many Trainers like the way Pikachu
looks, you don’t see this Pokémon very often.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
When electricity builds up inside its body, it
becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
When electricity builds up inside its body, it
becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail
to gather electricity from the atmosphere.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
It can discharge bursts of electricity exceeding 100,000 volts—
a single strike with that amount of power would incapacitate one
of the Copperajah of my homeland.
